response.overview: In August 2018 I was interviewed on my roof by Jussi Penttinen, a Finnish devotee who in recent times has been responsible for collating and uploading the subtitles that appear in many different languages on my Youtube channel. Jussi filmed his questions separately while he was standing on the Arunachala pradakshina road. During the talks he was accompanied by his friend Jukka Korhonen who filmed the replies and later edited the films. Thanks to both of them.  Part 1: 'What am I doing wrong?  Part 2: Mastan and Lakshmana Swamy  Part 3: Love, Surrender, Devotion and the Power of Japa  part 4: The Role of Ritual Worship in Bhagavan's Teachings  Part 5: Sadhu Om, Muruganar and Tinnai Swami  Part 6: Life after Self-Realisation  Part 7: Bhagavan's Teachings in the Modern World
response.title: (Bhagavan's Teachings) Talks with David Godman
